Creating and Managing PPTP Users

To create and enable PPTP users:

 1. Choose VPN > PPTP Server. In the PPTP User Account Table, click Add Row.

 2. Enter the username and password that will authenticate the PPTP user. Enter values that are between 4 to 32 characters long.

 3. Check the Enable check box for the user.

 4. To import usernames and passwords from a CSV file, click Import. The Administration > Users page is displayed. In the Import Username and Password section, click Browse to locate the file, and click Import. See Importing User Accounts for more information.

 5. Save your user accounts.
